mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPINGCART_PRODUCT (SHOPPINGCARTS_ID, PRODUCTS_ID) VALUES (#{shoppingCartId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId, jdbcType=INTEGER});
mapper.select: SELECT P.id AS id, P.name AS name FROM PRODUCT AS P LEFT JOIN SHOPPINGCART_PRODUCT AS SP ON P.id = SP.PRODUCTS_ID LEFT JOIN SHOPPINGCART AS S ON S.id = SP.SHOPPINGCARTS_ID WHERE P.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
